name: NBA 2K Rating Predictor
desc: Reverse engineered the NBA 2K rating system to hypothesis test if populairty factors into ratings.

name: Wordle Guesser
desc: Optimally solves the daily Wordle using word frequency analysis, web scraping, and Python coding techniques.

name: Analysis Workbench
desc: Collection of analysis notebooks that takes input datasets and carries out 20 different forms of analysis, including network, image, and statistical analysis.

name: Image Generator
desc: Given data regarding individuals, this code generates accurate images for each entry in a time-efficient manner.

name: Food.com Recipe Hypothesis Testing
desc: Conducted data science hypothesis tests to determine if relationships exist between the data and recipe ratings.

name: Personalized Stock Tracker
desc: Analyzes the stock market, common stock movements, and related articles and emails portfolio summaries and potential stock movements.

name: Limesurvey-SuAVE Documentation
desc: Created a step-by-step guide on how to use Limesurvey and SuAVE side-by-side for beginners to be able to curate survey data and visualize it.
